message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of our premium product with you. I believe it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $950000. This is a great opportunity to get your hands on this incredible product, and I'm sure you won't find a better deal elsewhere.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $850000. I believe that's a more reasonable price for this product, considering its value to me is no more than $1000000.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm not willing to go as low as $850000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $900000. This is a fair price considering the product's value to you and the value I place on it.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above that price. I'm willing to go up to $880000, but that's as high as I'm willing to go. I'm confident that's a fair price for this product, considering its value to me.
